## Deployment Options
Deploy Quarto interactives easily, unlike building a full Streamlit clone:
- **Static (Widgets/JS/webexercises)**: GitHub Pages, Quarto Pub, Netlifyâ€”free, no server needed.[4]
- **Shiny-based**: shinyapps.io (easiest), Hugging Face Spaces, Posit Connect; run `quarto render` then deploy app files.[7][4]
Start with: `quarto publish gh-pages` for GitHub-hosted quizzes/classes.[8][4]
